title: Who was Antony Noghès? All you need to know about the Monaco GP creator
summary: Where others saw a route around Monte-Carlo, Anthony Noghès saw a race track. This is the story of the man who created the Monaco Grand Prix circuit — and also introduced the chequered flag to motor sport

qa_pairs.question: What is the significance of Antony Noghès in Formula 1 history?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: He created the Monaco Grand Prix circuit.
wrong_options: He was a famous driver in the 1960s.
He designed the first Formula 1 car.
He was the first team principal of Ferrari.
